channel.title: [508]Script help!

item.title: [508]Script help!
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“Yorchi elite, post:1, topic:284946”]case 220:
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Martin”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Here you go my dear! And Try doing ::master”, 241, 4);
break;

I added this to my NPCOption1.java, but its will not work why?

the npc i wants to talk is : 2270
i think the case it wrong
help :![/quote] Make it like this:

case 22: p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Martin", 241, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Here you go my dear! And Try doing ::master", 241, 4); break;Then it should work

Read full topic
